name: Birth of Hero (itch)
description:
Language : English / Korean

After half a year, the Devil will be resurrected!

The former hero, Rigade, has decided to raise three of his children as heroes.
His plan is to bring heroes to one country every month,
travelling six countries for training.
Who among the three will become the hero after 6 months?
Or it may be you yourself, your wife or your father.
